sentences.sContent: Each has a snug mezzanine area and an antler-fenced balcony about eight metres above ground.
sentences.sContent_eng: Each has a snug mezzanine area and an antler-fenced balcony about eight metres above ground.
sentences.sCn: 两间树屋离开地面有八米之高，每间屋里有舒适的房间和由鹿角做围篱的阳台。

sentences.sContent: At first the scientists believed the geometrical figure carved onto the antler could have been either the mentioned woman, or a nude man raising his arms.
sentences.sContent_eng: At first the scientists believed the geometrical figure carved onto the antler could have been either the mentioned woman, or a nude man raising his arms.
sentences.sCn: 一开始，科学家们认为刻画在鹿角上的几何图案有可能是之前说到的女性，也可能是一个举着双臂的裸体男性。

sentences.sContent: By happy symmetry, where our reindeer are carved on mammoth tusk, the other sculpture shows a mammoth carved on a reindeer antler.
sentences.sContent_eng: By happy symmetry, where our reindeer are carved on mammoth tusk, the other sculpture shows a mammoth carved on a reindeer antler.
sentences.sCn: 可喜可叹的是，我们刚刚谈论的是一对驯鹿雕刻在猛犸象牙上，那另一件雕塑品却是一头猛犸象雕刻到驯鹿鹿角上。

synos.tran: [脊椎]鹿角，[中医]茸角；多叉鹿角

trans.tranOther: one of the two horns of a male  deer
